name: Rush Hour!
description:
Are you ready to go through busy intersections during rush hour to get home?

The rule is simple:
Hold your finger to move the red car.
Lift it up when you want to stop.

Since this incredible graphic design shows us a very complex road infrastructure, you will experience an exciting feeling just like you are actually driving in a crowded metropolis.

Enjoy your thrilling drive, reach your goals safely!
And let’s see how many stages you can clear!
